COVID-19 Update: Information for Parents
Lauren Goins
Monday, April 06, 2020
img.p: SSD Families: In a press conference this afternoon, the governor directed all Arkansas schools to remain closed to onsite instruction through the end of the school year to prevent the spread of the coronavirus. We will continue to provide instruction through our digital learning plan. We appreciate all of you for everything you are doing to support your child's education during this challenging time. We have created a page on our website for our Digital Learning Plan and COVID-19 Updates. Tap on the link to view that page. https://bit.ly/2RgdPvI
